title: Around 40 Otoko no Isekai Tsuuhan

synonyms: Arafoo Otoko no Isekai Tsuuhan Seikatsu
The Mail Order Life of a Man Around 40 in Another World
alternative_titles.en: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World
alternative_titles.ja: アラフォー男の異世界通販

synopsis:
From nowhere, middle-aged illustrator Kenichi Hamada finds himself summoned to another world. Despite arriving in an unfamiliar land, he realizes he can still connect to an online shop named Shangri-La, which he frequented back in Japan, to order almost anything. Not long after, Kenichi comes across a town and, using Shangri-La, decides to become a merchant in the settlement.

By selling products from Earth, he is quickly able to make a living for himself while gaining acquaintances and the attention of local companies. However, the man just wants to live a quiet life without nuisances and leaves the town to build a cabin in a nearby forest. Though interrupted from time to time, there is nothing that can stop Kenichi from having his peaceful days.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
